title: user login functionality
description: Verify that the user can successfully log in using valid credentials through the /api/auth/login endpoint and that session management is correctly handled.

title: user logout functionality
description: Verify that the user can successfully log out through the /api/auth/logout endpoint and that the session is properly terminated.

title: qr login functionality
description: Verify that the user can authenticate using QR code login via the /api/auth/qr-login endpoint and that the authentication process is secure and reliable.

title: cylinder creation update and listing
description: Verify that cylinders can be created, updated, and listed accurately using the /api/master/cylinders endpoint with no data loss or inconsistency.

title: charging process actions
description: Verify that charging actions (START and COMPLETE) can be processed correctly for selected cylinders via the /api/work/charging endpoint and that cylinder statuses are updated accordingly.

title: delivery and collection processing
description: Verify that delivery and collection actions can be processed correctly for cylinders associated with customers through the /api/work/delivery endpoint.

title: cylinder history retrieval
description: Verify that historical data for specific cylinders can be retrieved accurately through the /api/history/cylinder endpoint, reflecting all past activities.

title: long term inventory reporting
description: Verify that the system can generate comprehensive long-term inventory reports through the /api/system/reports/long-term endpoint with consistent and complete data.
